traits.Adhesive Blossoms: The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape DC 11+1d4 + 9). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
traits.False Appearance: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

actions.Thorns: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.
